title: Maruti Suzuki India total sales rise 10 pc at 1,87,196 units in March
description: Maruti Suzuki India's March sales grew by 10% to 1,87,196 units. The company achieved a milestone in annual sales, highest yearly domestic sales, and record exports. FY24 showed growth in total sales, domestic passenger vehicle sales, and exports.
